name: Siyu Huang Assistant Professor at Clemson University
research: Leading the Vision and Learning Lab (ViL) at Clemson University, focusing on Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and Generative Model. Supervised by Prof. Zhongfei (Mark) Zhang and Prof. Xi Li.
prospective_students: Motivated PhD students and interns are welcome. Courses like Machine Learning-based Image Synthesis and Applied Computer Vision offer comprehensive exploration of related topics.
